pr_title: Improves handling and delivery of variants.

timeline.message: Detects and rejects empty files in case the conversion engine had a bad day.
Uses proper exceptions and HTTP response codes to signal the conversion outcomes.

Uses a dedicated retry wait loop for optimistic locks and anther for waiting for conversion results.

For OLs there is no point in a fixed wait time as only the difference for two threads counts,
not the time itself.
